description: Attic Red-Figure Cup Fragment (comprised of 6 Joined Fragments); Possibly Brygos (Greek (Attic), active about 490 - 470 B.C.), or Briseis Painter (Greek (Attic), active 510 - 470 B.C.); Athens, Greece; about 490 - 480 B.C.; Terracotta; 15.4 cm (6 1/16 in.); 81.AE.212.10; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
